name: 3tris - Color Brick Adventure
description:
Match-3 in a completely new flavor. Now the blocks drop in diffferent forms of bricks and you can move and turn them before they reach the bottom. Arrange them to get 3 or more blocks of the same color in a row and get them removed or even be rewarded with special effects.

This game contains lots of different levels with individual challenges:

- Collect blocks of different colors

- Solve the puzzle before time runs out

- Solve the puzzle with a maximum number of possible moves

- Different level layouts

- Different drop speeds

- Level dependent number of colors

- Prefilled Level Layouts

Compete with your friends and share your highest level and highscores across your Google Play Profile or Facebook.
